ORIGAM Documentation : Dashboard Widgets

Created by Rita Vavrdová, last modified by Zuzana Čapková on Feb 08, 2019

Dashboards Widgets are predefined parts (e.g. charts, tables, values) that users can later add to their dashboards.

MODEL STRUCTURE

Dashboard Widgets
 Chart Widget
  Parameter
 CheckBox Widget
  Parameter
 Currency Widget
  Parameter
 Date Widget
  Parameter
 Folder
  Parameter
 Horizontal Container
  Parameter
 Lookup Widget
  Parameter
 Panel Widget
  Parameter
 Text Widget
  Parameter
 Vertical Container
  Parameter
